examples: My dad bought a stylish suit for his friend's wedding.
The rich man bought a big house and a fancy car.
We bought a bag of coarse sea salt from the specialty store.
She bought an expensive dress for a special occasion.
I bought a pound of fresh meat from the butcher.
words.defineEn: to get something in exchange for paying money
words.defineVi: để có được một cái gì đó để đổi lấy việc trả tiền

examples: Put your clothes in the cupboard.
She gave him presents and clothes.
All clothes are in mint condition and less than two years old.
She received many compliments on her stylish clothes.
My clothes won't all go in that one suitcase.
words.defineEn: the things we wear to cover our body, such as pants, shirts, and jackets
words.defineVi: những thứ chúng ta mặc để che thân, chẳng hạn như quần, áo sơ mi và áo khoác

words.defineEn: to leave the house to go somewhere, usually to do something enjoyable
words.defineVi: rời khỏi nhà để đi đâu đó, thường là để làm điều gì đó thú vị

examples: Good wine can make a meal.
The chef cooks a delicious meal in the restaurant.
Meals can be served to you in your room.
She cooked a delicious meal in the kitchen.
She enjoys cooking meals for her family in the kitchen of their home.
words.defineEn: the food that you eat on regular occasions during the day, especially breakfast, lunch, or dinner; or any of these occasions
words.defineVi: thức ăn mà bạn ăn thường xuyên trong ngày, đặc biệt là bữa sáng, bữa trưa hoặc bữa tối; hoặc bất kỳ dịp nào trong số này

examples: The police closed in.
The mother gently cradled her newborn baby in her arms.
His partner left the table in a fit of pique.
In 2018 the party had 10 000 members.
The birds built their nest in the tree.
words.defineEn: used before a specific period of time to show when or at what time something happens or how long it takes for it to happen
words.defineVi: được sử dụng trước một khoảng thời gian cụ thể để hiển thị khi nào hoặc vào thời điểm nào đó xảy ra hoặc mất bao lâu để nó xảy ra

examples: The heat was really on at work.
That hot guy had a good head on his shoulders.
The children enjoyed a refreshing slice of watermelon on a hot summer day.
On the credit side, the restaurant offers a wide range of choices.
Our company puts the emphasis on quality.
words.defineEn: used to show a day or date
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để hiển thị một ngày hoặc ngày

examples: My father pays his bills at the beginning of the month.
My friends enjoyed tangy barbecue gammon skewers at the summer barbecue.
The professor made mincemeat of the speaker at the conference.
My friends enjoyed smoky beef rib chops at the countryside barbecue.
The lingonberry sauce perfectly complemented the roasted turkey at Thanksgiving dinner.
words.defineEn: expressing the exact time when something happens
words.defineVi: thể hiện thời gian chính xác khi một cái gì đó xảy ra

examples: When does the train go?
When does the concert begin?
When his head broke the surface he took in deep gulps of air.
So when will you deliver the cargo?
When he starts a job he goes at it hammer and tongs.
words.defineEn: used when we want to ask at what time something happens
words.defineVi: được sử dụng khi chúng ta muốn hỏi vào thời gian nào một cái gì đó xảy ra

examples: See full dictionary entry for heart.
See my car?
This stadium has seen many thrilling football games.
The twentieth century saw dramatic changes in most areas of life.
Our car has seen better days!
words.defineEn: to notice a thing or person with our eyes
words.defineVi: để ý một điều hoặc người với đôi mắt của chúng tôi

examples: The film caught a cold over the outstanding debt.
The film received lavish praise from critics for its groundbreaking visual effects, compelling storyline, and outstanding performances.
The film ups the ante on special effects.
The film faithfully follows Shakespeare's plot.
Shergar film falls at the first fence in Cannes.
words.defineEn: a story that we can watch on a screen, like a TV or in a theater, with moving pictures and sound
words.defineVi: một câu chuyện mà chúng ta có thể xem trên màn hình, chẳng hạn như TV hoặc trong rạp hát, với hình ảnh và âm thanh chuyển động

examples: That song always sends a shiver down my spine.
Anne's aunt always sends her birthday cards and gifts.
I sent the package by airmail.
He sent me a copy of his new book.
She sent the kids to bed early.
words.defineEn: to take something to a specific location or making arrangements for it to be taken there, particularly by post
words.defineVi: để đưa một cái gì đó đến một địa điểm cụ thể hoặc sắp xếp để nó được đưa đến đó, đặc biệt là qua đường bưu điện

examples: The text runs along the margin of the page.
When designing a website or presentation, it's important to use visuals to break up text and convey information in a more engaging way - after all, a picture is worth a thousand words.

The student struggled with a challenging book, but knew that every book must be chewed to get out its juice - it was essential to persevere and put in the effort to understand and appreciate the text.
Most people always just text.
- Text a doctor.
words.defineEn: anything that is in written form
words.defineVi: bất cứ thứ gì ở dạng viết

examples: The manager played his strongest side of the season.
The bedside radio played softly.
The media, as always, played an important part in the election campaign.
Fathers play a crucial role in their children's upbringing and development.
His dedication and hard work played a big part in the company's success.
words.defineEn: to enjoy yourself and do things for fun, like children
words.defineVi: để tận hưởng bản thân và làm những điều cho vui, giống như trẻ em

examples: Sports were not at the top of the list.
One swallow does not make a summer in sports.
Ice hockey is a beloved sport in Canada.
Friends shared a platter of crispy chicken wings with tangy dipping sauces at the sports bar.
Their approach to sports teaching broke the mold.
words.defineEn: a physical activity that has special rules, needs effort and skill, and can be a competitive game as well as entertainment and exercise
words.defineVi: một hoạt động thể chất có các quy tắc đặc biệt, cần nỗ lực và kỹ năng, đồng thời có thể là một trò chơi cạnh tranh cũng như giải trí và rèn luyện sức khỏe

examples: Does this pub do lunches?
Does this pub do lunches?
Does the price include tax?
Microprocessors do the calculations in the twinkling of an eye.
The gang did a warehouse and a supermarket.
words.defineEn: to perform a particular activity or task
words.defineVi: để thực hiện một hoạt động cụ thể hoặc nhiệm vụ

examples: She shares her eraser with her classmates during exams.
I always get the jitters before exams.
I always get butterflies before an exam.
You may turn over your exam papers now.
It's an easy exam.
words.defineEn: a way of testing how much someone knows about a subject
words.defineVi: một cách kiểm tra xem ai đó biết bao nhiêu về một chủ đề

examples: That hot guy had a good head on his shoulders.
The hotel had expensive rates during the holiday season.
The group has a new CD in the pipeline.
The police had the situation well in hand.
The theatre company has several new productions in the pipeline for next season.
words.defineEn: to hold, possess, or own an object or a quality
words.defineVi: để giữ, sở hữu, hoặc sở hữu một đối tượng hoặc một chất lượng

examples: That holiday cost me a small fortune.
The closing of the airport knocked our holiday plans on the head.
I'll always remember this holiday.
My favorite month is December because of the holidays.
We sometimes visit our relatives during the holidays.
words.defineEn: a period of recreation away from home or work
words.defineVi: một khoảng thời gian giải trí xa nhà hoặc nơi làm việc

examples: 95 per cent of the UK can now get superfast broadband.
This room gets very little sunshine.
Get a load of that dress Mag!
Get a load of George over there.
The police got wind of the illegal drug deal.
words.defineEn: to receive or come to have something
words.defineVi: để nhận hoặc đến để có một cái gì đó

examples: The lawyer presented the right argument in court.
Bring Helen a present.
Bring a present for Helen.
He presented a false document as evidence in the court case.
Our hosts presented us with an embarrassment of riches.
words.defineEn: something given to someone as a sign of appreciation or on a special occasion
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó được trao cho ai đó như một dấu hiệu của sự đánh giá cao hoặc vào một dịp đặc biệt

examples: They set a date for a full hearing at the end of February.
I’ll check the dates.
The wedding date is set for next month.
We should mark the date on the calendar for our family gathering.
Her date failed to show.
words.defineEn: a specific day in a month or sometimes a year, shown using a number and sometimes a name
words.defineVi: một ngày cụ thể trong một tháng hoặc đôi khi là một năm, được hiển thị bằng số và đôi khi là tên

examples: Today is Monday.
The lawyers put another nail in her coffin today.
The euro hit a record low in trading today.
I saw a famous actress at the shopping mall today.
All winter coats are half-price today.
words.defineEn: on the present day not tomorrow or yesterday
words.defineVi: vào ngày hôm nay không phải ngày mai hay ngày hôm qua

examples: Give me a call tomorrow.
They're busting a move tomorrow.
We have to learn one of Hamlet's speeches for school tomorrow.
The charges against the suspect will come up in court tomorrow.
The President hits town tomorrow.
words.defineEn: the day after the present day
words.defineVi: ngày sau ngày hôm nay

examples: When does the train go?
When does the concert begin?
When his head broke the surface he took in deep gulps of air.
So when will you deliver the cargo?
When he starts a job he goes at it hammer and tongs.
words.defineEn: used when we want to ask at what time something happens
words.defineVi: được sử dụng khi chúng ta muốn hỏi vào thời gian nào một cái gì đó xảy ra

examples: My friend's birthday is on a Friday this year.
Finally the couple may be celebrating a birthday, a wedding anniversary or some other red-letter day.
It's your friends birthday.
I bought a toy for my nephew's birthday.
He hid my son's new bicycle until his birthday
words.defineEn: the day and month of your birth in every year
words.defineVi: ngày và tháng sinh của bạn trong mỗi năm

examples: This job puts years on you.
The apple tree in our backyard produces juicy fruits every year.
Cancer kills thousands of people every year.
The apple orchard typically yields a bountiful harvest each year.
Company profits took a tumble last year.
words.defineEn: a period of time that is made up of twelve months, particularly one that starts on January first and ends on December thirty-first
words.defineVi: một khoảng thời gian được tạo thành từ mười hai tháng, đặc biệt là một tháng bắt đầu vào ngày đầu tiên của tháng một và kết thúc vào ngày 31 tháng 12

examples: So, this is the Born This Way Multi-Use Sculpting Concealer.
Just Born was actually looking for jelly bean technology.
Just Born decided to ramp up production of these gooey treats.
Peeps make up 70% of Just Born's annual revenue.
We visited Just Born's Pennsylvania factory to see how these iconic treats come to life.
words.defineEn: brought to this world through birth
words.defineVi: mang đến thế giới này thông qua sinh

examples: The clock said three o'clock.
Set the alarm for 7 o'clock.
The library opens at 10 o'clock on weekdays.
She finishes her piano practice at 7 o'clock.
The restaurant reservation is for 8 o'clock tonight.
words.defineEn: put after the numbers one to twelve to show or tell what time it is, only when it is at that exact hour
words.defineVi: đặt sau các số từ một đến mười hai để hiển thị hoặc cho biết mấy giờ rồi, chỉ khi nó vào chính xác giờ đó

examples: I really love summer evenings.
The college also runs evening classes in bricklaying and joinery.
Throughout the evening, the waiter handled the busy restaurant.
The party is on Friday evening.
Programs are running a few minutes behind schedule this evening.
words.defineEn: the time of day that is between the time that the sun starts to set and when the sky becomes completely dark
words.defineVi: thời gian trong ngày nằm giữa thời điểm mặt trời bắt đầu lặn và khi bầu trời trở nên tối hoàn toàn
